casebody.data:
James Cornell HOWARD
v.
WAYNE COUNTY CLERK OF COURT No. 362P17-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina. James Cornell Howard, For Howard, James C. Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 12th of July 2019 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wayne County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."

Davis, J. recused
